execution_plan.description: Compute the maximum price among goods that are cakes.
execution_plan.query: SELECT MAX(price) AS s1__max_price FROM goods WHERE food = 'Cake';

execution_plan.description: Select id and flavor (and price for join/filter) of goods whose price equals the maximum cake price.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS s2__id, flavor AS s2__flavor, price AS s2__price FROM goods WHERE price = $step1.s1__max_price AND food = 'Cake';
